card.name: Abhoth
card.text: Every Location gains the Gate attribute, and each Gate can be used more than once (pay Location Sanity cost each time). No Investigator may gain Sanity.

card.name: Aldebaran Moves in the Sky
card.text: If Aldebaran is not already in play, then play this card as normal. If it is already in play, then Bury it and Bury this card. When revealed, Bury all other Events (except Travel cards). While in play, only one Phobia can affect any Investigator (randomly chosen).

card.name: Arthur Machen
card.text: While this card is in play, subtract one from the Minimum number of cards that you may keep in your Hand. Not cumulative with other Allies that lower your Minimum.

card.name: Assault on Y'ha Nthlei
card.text: After your STAND AGAINST THE ORDER, find amidst the rubble the PONAPE SCRIPTURE, R'LYEH TEXT, or CTHAAT AQUADINGEN (one of these, not in English), revealing a dire plot against humanity. Convince a STEADFAST SOLDIER of this threat, and he calls in the Navy. A U-BOAT (Travel Underwater) attacks the underwater city of Y'HA-NTHLEI. Two DEEP ONES and a SHOGGOTH counterattack lead by FATHER DAGON or MOTHER HYDRA. Clad only in a DIVING SUIT, dash your SPHERE OF NATH to the ground, burying the inhuman edifice forever.

card.name: Astrophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point whenever an Event is played concerning a Star or Stars, and whenever it changes from Day to Night.

card.name: Bal Sagoth
card.text: This island has no airstrips. You must use a Travel by Sea card to get to this Location. May use this Gate more than once, but must pay this card's Sanity cost for each subsequent Gate use.

card.name: Become Spectral Hunter
card.text: Treat target Ally as if bearing an Enchanted Weapon, and Invisible, for the remainder of this Round. Bury Ally at the conclusion of Combat.

card.name: Body Warping of Gorgoroth
card.text: Place target Ally face-down in his or her Investigator's Threat. Ally now functions as a Monster. Bury Ally after Combat.

card.name: Book of Dzyan
card.text: You know the languages of Chinese and Hyperborean while this card is in play.

card.name: Book of Eibon
card.text: Draw one additional card at the beginning of each Round while this card is in play. Not cumulative with other cards that allow you to increase hand size.

card.name: Book of Eibon
card.text: Draw one additional card at the beginning of each Round while this card is in play. Not cumulative with other cards that allow you to increase Hand size.

card.name: Byakhee
card.text: Value is 6 when Aldebaran Moves in the Sky is in play. Can only affect Allies and an Investigator at an Outside Location. If Controlled, can be used as Travel By Air. Can fly to Space Locations.

card.name: Call Power of Nyambe
card.text: Choose Allies to be affected. Tally value of cards chosen excluding Weapons or other Artifacts, and add that value to your Investigator's Sanity points. Bury the chosen Allies.

card.name: Celeano
card.text: Beginning each Turn, you must be able to Survive in Space or lose 5 points of Sanity. Celeano is not affected by Events or Spells that directly affect the top Location card of your Story Deck. May use this Gate more than once, but must pay this card's Sanity cost for each subsequent Gate use.

card.name: Create Time Warp
card.text: Move any Location in your Story Deck to the top of the deck. Ignore Sanity gain/loss; may reuse Gate.

card.name: Cruise, The
card.text: Begin in a CITY/WATER Location. TRAVEL BY SEA to sail to a SOUTH PACIFIC Location and speak with the STEADFAST CHIEF. Then use another TRAVEL BY SEA to get back to a different CITY. There must, of course, be a STORM at sea along the way.

card.name: Cthulhu
card.text: All Monsters may Join. No Investigator may gain Sanity.

card.name: Devil Reef
card.text: From this Location, just off the coast of Innsmouth, you may Walk to Y'ha-Nthlei.

card.name: Devolution
card.text: Replace target Corrupt Ally with a Monster card chosen from that Investigator's Story Deck. That Monster now functions as an Ally.

card.name: Dimensional Shambler
card.text: Bypasses your opponent's Threat. Add 1 point to the Value of this card if your Investigator is in any Time other than the present, or in any Exotic Location, during Combat. Joins Dimensional Shamblers.

card.name: Disk of the Hyades
card.text: While this card is in play, no Living Dead Monsters may Join.

card.name: Diving Suit
card.text: Your Investigator and all Allies are able to Breath Underwater while this card is in play.

card.name: Dread Curse of Azathoth
card.text: Bury the target Ally.

card.name: Easter Island
card.text: This island has no airstrips. You must use a Travel by Sea card to get to this Location.

card.name: Elder Sign
card.text: Make this sign to cause a Great Old One or Outer God card to be Buried. Bury this spell when used.

attr.value: Affects Great Old One or Outer God

card.name: Eltdown Shards
card.text: Yithian Mental Contact cannot be played against you while this card is in play.

card.name: Fly
card.text: Travel to any location as if Walking. May travel between Regions. May not travel to Exotic Locations.

card.name: Harvard University Houghton Library
card.text: All Professors and Students add 1 point to their card value when this card is your current Location.

card.name: Hastur
card.text: It is always night; Bury any Day cards in play. Day cards may not be played. Treat all Locations (including Exotic Locations) as if they belong to the same Region. No Investigator may gain Sanity.

attr.value: Outside/Country/Gate Location, Aldebaran Moves in the Sky

card.name: Kiss of Dagon
card.text: Growing gills temporarily, your Investigator and all Allies are able to Breathe Underwater until the start of the next Round.

card.name: Lost Temple of Atlantis
card.text: Beginning each turn, your Investigator must be able to Breath Underwater or lose 5 points of Sanity. The Lost Temple is not affected by Events or Spells that directly affects the top Location card of your Story Deck. May use this Gate more than once, but must pay this card's Sanity cost for each subsequent Gate use.

card.name: Mao Ceremony
card.text: Use this Spell to avoid the effects of all Great Old Ones or Outer Gods in play for the remainder of this Round, including Combat. You may gain Sanity.

attr.value: Affects Opponents' Great Old One or Outer God

card.name: Mist of R'lyeh
card.text: Target Monster becomes invisible for the remainder of this Round.

card.name: One of the Circle
card.text: The Cthulhu Mythos took form when various writers wrote to one another and built on each others' creations. You, too, can become one of this circle. Of course, take inspiration from EDGAR ALLEN POE and LORD DUSANY. Then, start writing to H.P. LOVECRAFT, ROBERT W. CHAMBERS, and ARTHUR MACHEN. Finally, write a TOME of your own.

card.name: Orne Formula & Diagrams
card.text: Increase the value of any one Ally card by 2 points. If that Ally is a Corrupt Cultist, increase Spell capacity by one. If Ally is Simon Orne increase Spell capacity by two.

card.name: Otaheite
card.text: This island has no airstrips. You must use a Travel by Sea card to get to this Location.

card.name: Ponape
card.text: This island has no airstrips. You must use a Travel by Sea card to get to this Location. May use this Gate more than once, but must pay this card's Sanity cost for each subsequent Gate use.

card.name: Ponape Scripture
card.text: You may Breathe Underwater while this card is in play.

card.name: Powder of Ibn Ghazi
card.text: Attacking Invisible Monsters are now Visible for the remainder of this Turn.

card.name: R'lyeh
card.text: You can only play this card if your Investigator has all three pieces of the R'lyeh Disk. You must use a Travel by Sea card to get to this location. May use this Gate more than once, but must pay this card's Sanity cost for each subsequent Gate use.

card.name: R'lyeh Disk, Left Fragment
card.text: There are three parts to this Artifact; you must have all three to play the R'lyeh Card. Each portion of the disk in your possession increase the value of Star Spawn by one point.

card.name: R'lyeh Disk, Right Fragment
card.text: There are three parts to this Artifact; you must have all three to play the R'lyeh Card. Each portion of the disk in your possession increase the value of Star Spawn by one point.

card.name: R'lyeh Disk, Top Fragment
card.text: There are three parts to this Artifact; you must have all three to play the R'lyeh Card. Each portion of the disk in your possession increase the value of Star Spawn by one point.

card.name: R'lyeh Text
card.text: This Tome can serve as any one of the three pieces of the R'lyeh Disk that you need in play before you can play the R'lyeh Location (no effect on Star Spawn).

card.name: Radiance of Alsophocus
card.text: Eliminate the benefits of Night for all Threats for the remainder of this Round and through Combat.

card.name: Retoka
card.text: This island has no airstrips. You must use a Travel by Sea card to get to this Location.

attr.value: Steadfast Author & Artist, Knows English & French

card.name: Royal Geographic Society, The
card.text: Tell us tales of (one Location each) Lovecraft Country SITES, CATACOMBS in Europe, and TOMBS in the Middle East. We expect your circle of friends to include (four total Allies) AUTHORS, ARTISTS, a SCHOLAR or PROFESSOR, and an INVENTOR or EXPLORER. Your fine gift to our humble Lodge of a scandalously dangerous ARTIFACT or TOME costing at least 1 Sanity point only proves your generosity. Welcome to the Society!

card.name: Sarnath Sigil
card.text: Reduce the attack of all Greater Servitors by 3 points per Monster Card.

card.name: Schizophrenia
card.text: Lose 1 additional Sanity point each time that you cast a Spell.

card.name: Seaplane
card.text: On a following turn, play any new Location card featuring the Water attribute, in either the same or different Region, right-side up on top of your Story Deck. May travel to Locations (except Exotic) where Air Travel is normally forbidden.

card.name: Song of Hastur
card.text: Destroy knowledge! A random Spell from chosen Tome or Ally is Buried. If cast while a Waning Moon is in play, choose any Tome (plus all Spells) for your opponent to Bury.

card.name: Soul Singing
card.text: Gain 3 Sanity points when cast during a Full Moon.

card.name: Space Mead
card.text: Your Investigator and all Allies are protected while Space is an attribute of your current Location.

card.name: Star Spawn of Cthulhu
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card for each portion of the R'lyeh Disk that your Investigator has in play. Subtract 1 point from the value of this card for each Tome featuring the Cthulhu sign possessed by the opponent this Monster attacks.

card.name: Steal Life
card.text: Transfer to your Investigator's Sanity points the value of one opponent's Ally, excluding the value of any Artifacts or Weapons. Flip that Ally face-down.

card.name: Strange Case Of Charles Fort, The
card.text: Working with a PROFESSOR or INVENTOR, you uncover disturbing correlations between certain celestial phenomena (ALDEBARAN MOVES IN THE SKY, the FULL MOON, and an ECLIPSE) and earthly disasters including EARTHQUAKE, STORM, and DROUGHT. Field work takes you to two LOCATIONS in two different REGIONS.

card.name: Temple, The
card.text: The legend of Lost Atlantis thrive in every culture. Behind every legend, however, lies a kernel of Truth. TRAVEL UNDERWATER (U-BOAT) from any WATER LOCATION to the LOST TEMPLE OF ATLANTIS, using the DISC OF THE HYADES to find your way. Go to the Temple, and find a TOME. Then, return to a different WATER LOCATION.

card.name: Thirty-Five Abominable Adulations of the Bloated One
card.text: Extend the time that a Great Old One or Outer God card remain in play by one full Round.

card.name: Tramp Steamer
card.text: On a following Turn play a new Location card featuring the Water attribute in either the same Region or a different Region, right-side up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: U-Boat
card.text: Play this card at a Location featuring the Water attribute. On a following turn play a new Location card featuring the Water attribute either in the same Region, in a different Region, or Underwater.

card.name: Voola Ritual
card.text: Summon or Control a Greater Servitor.

card.name: Wakalea
card.text: Bury this card to either keep a Great Old One or Outer God in play for an additional Round, or Bury a Great Old One or Outer God in play.

card.name: Y'ha-Nthlei
card.text: Beginning each Turn, you must be able to Breath Underwater or lose 5 points of Sanity. Y'ha-Nthlei is not affected by Events or Spells that directly affect the top Location card of your Story Deck. May use this Gate more than once, but must pay this card's Sanity cost for each subsequent Gate use.
